title: Abyss of Misery
description: He had committed the worst crime. And, he deserved the worst punishment.They arrested him and took him to the edge of the abyss. They pushed him in. He had expected a sudden or eventual death. What he hadn't expected was a rescue.There was no one who cared about him. So, why would anyone want him saved? He found the answer later and it was ugly.
author: Naoman Saeed
